REASON: Opthalmologist prescribed Lotemax to treat dry eyes which are side effect of epithelial basement membrane dystrophy.  After a few days I started experiencing sore throat and hoarse voice. Did not connect it to the eye drops. Thought it was an allergy or maybe a lingering virus.  Only after accidentally missing a few doses and starting again did I realize it was the Lotemax.  Stopped taking it and sore throat and hoarseness stopped immediately. Doc said he never heard of that side effect.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR LOTEMAX: Side effect was completely reversible and not fatal but be warned that eye drops can have serious side effects.
